title: Creation of European empires late 19th c. Africa

content.question: Which of the following facilitated the creation of European empires in Africa during the late nineteenth century?

choices.label: Africans’ unified resistance to European intervention
Europeans’ desire to develop industry in Africa
Europeans’ use of both warfare and diplomacy
Africans’ widespread acceptance of European laws

content.answer: Europeans’ use of both warfare and diplomacy

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
